data.meta_description: Tribute for Michael W. Bell | Michael W. Bell, beloved husband, son, brother and uncle, passed away on Saturday, November 14, 2020. He is survived by his wife of 33 years, Julie Bertaut Bell and his nephew, Michael Aaron...
data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Michael W. Bell | Garden of Memories Funeral Home and Cem
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
